ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus looks at Delta as he uncloaks. He nods, seeing the Iron Fist up ahead. Follow me, he tells Delta, flying forward, slightly out of the shields

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Delta as he uncloaks. He nods, seeing the Iron Fist up ahead.

"Follow me," he tells Delta, flying forward, slightly out of the shields' 
range.

"Panzertron," he says into his comm-link, "This is Zardus. Requesting 
permission to enter?"
